item.title: Trump says he would sign bill to release Epstein files if it reaches his desk
item.description: Trump said he would sign the bill to compel the Justice Department to release all files relating sex offender Jeffrey Epstein if it comes to his desk.

item.title: More than 130 arrested in North Carolina as governor says immigration crackdown is ‘stoking fear’
item.description: U.S. immigration agents arrested more than 130 people in a weekend sweep through North Carolina’s largest city.

item.title: Judge in Comey case raises alarm over 'profound investigative missteps'
item.description: A judge expressed concern Monday that the government's prosecution of James Comey may have been tainted by "profound investigative missteps."

item.title: Man accused of killing relatives of abandoned infant will seek change of venue
item.description: Austin Robert Drummond​ pleaded not guilty to charges including first-degree murder and aggravated kidnapping in the July 29 shootings.

item.title: WATCH: Chihuahua's viral moment hearing Spanish helps him find a home
item.description: ABC News' Danny New shares the heartwarming story of how a viral social media clip helped Nacho the chihuahua find his forever home.
